name: patient_id
description: Unique patient identifier

name: diagnosis_lumbar_spinal_stenosis
description: Lumbar Spinal Stenosis (LSS), the symptomatic condition for which Percutaneous Image-Guided Lumbar Decompression (PILD) is proposed as a treatment.

name: diagnosis_code_ICD10
description: ICD-10 codes relevant to NCD maintenance updates and conversions.

name: procedure_percutaneous_image_guided_lumbar_decompression
description: Percutaneous Image-Guided Lumbar Decompression (PILD) is a posterior decompression of the lumbar spine performed under indirect image guidance (e.g., fluoroscopic, CT) using contrast media, without direct visualization, to remove a portion of the lamina and debulk the ligamentum flavum.

name: procedure_endoscopically_assisted_laminotomy_laminectomy
description: Endoscopically assisted laminotomy/laminectomy requiring open and direct visualization, which is not within the scope of this NCD.

name: procedure_open_lumbar_decompression
description: Other open lumbar decompression procedures for Lumbar Spinal Stenosis (LSS), which are not within the scope of this NCD.

name: procedure_code_HCPCS
description: HCPCS procedure code 0275T for Percutaneous Image-Guided Lumbar Decompression (PILD), covered only when performed within any other CED approved clinical trial.

name: coverage_with_evidence_development_flag
description: Indicates that PILD is covered by Medicare when provided in a clinical study under Coverage with Evidence Development (CED).

name: clinical_study_enrollment_required
description: Requirement for beneficiaries with LSS to be enrolled in an approved clinical study for PILD coverage.

name: pild_coverage_effective_date_1
description: Effective date (January 9, 2014) for initial PILD coverage under CED in approved clinical studies.

name: pild_coverage_effective_date_2
description: Effective date (December 7, 2016) for PILD coverage through a prospective, longitudinal study using an FDA-approved/cleared device that completed a CMS-approved randomized control trial (RCT).

name: pild_reasonable_and_necessary_status
description: Indicates PILD for LSS is not considered reasonable and necessary under section 1862(a)(1)(A) of the Social Security Act.

name: coverage_contractor_discretion_flag
description: Indicates that coverage for procedures such as endoscopically assisted laminotomy/laminectomy and other open lumbar decompression procedures is at contractor discretion.

name: clinical_study_design
description: Required design for clinical studies to qualify for PILD coverage, including prospective, randomized, controlled design using validated and reliable measurement instruments and clinically appropriate comparator treatments.

name: clinical_study_patient_followup_duration
description: Requirement for the study protocol to specify a minimum length of patient follow-up time.

name: human_subjects_protection_compliance
description: Requirement for research studies to comply with all applicable Federal regulations concerning the protection of human subjects found at 45 Code of Federal Regulations (CFR) Part 46.

name: fda_regulatory_compliance
description: Requirement for FDA-regulated studies to comply with 21 CFR parts 50 and 56.

name: clinicaltrials_gov_registration_required
description: Requirement for clinical research studies to be registered on the ClinicalTrials.gov website by the principal sponsor/investigator prior to the enrollment of the first study subject, and for study sites and results to be listed in the database.

name: clinical_study_results_public_release_window_months_1
description: Timeframe (24 months) within which clinical study results (for studies under Section I criteria) must be made public after the end of data collection.

name: clinical_study_subpopulation_discussion_required
description: Requirement for study protocols to explicitly discuss subpopulations affected by the treatment, particularly traditionally underrepresented groups.

name: clinical_study_generalizability_discussion_required
description: Requirement for study protocols to explicitly discuss how the results are or are not expected to be generalizable to the Medicare population.

name: fda_approved_device_required
description: Requirement for PILD procedures to use an FDA-approved/cleared device for coverage under Section II criteria.

name: randomized_control_trial_completion_required
description: Requirement that the FDA-approved/cleared device for PILD procedures completed a CMS-approved randomized control trial (RCT) that met specified criteria.

name: rct_eligibility_criteria_maintenance
description: Requirement for prospective, longitudinal studies to maintain the eligibility (inclusion and exclusion) criteria specified in the CMS-approved RCT protocol.

name: clinical_study_results_public_release_window_months_2
description: Timeframe (12 months) within which clinical study results (for studies under Section II criteria) must be made public after the study’s primary completion date.
